item.title: Government Diet Makes You Fat and Kills You
item.description: If you’re sick and fat, it might not be your fault. You listen to your doctor. You follow government diet guidelines. You eat more fresh fruit and vegetables. You cut down on animal fat. You eat more grains. And you just get sicker and fatter. You’re told it’s your fault. But it’s probably not. You might be a good mom or dad who wants your kids to learn healthy eating habits.
